column2: 才华横溢
column3: Brilliant

column2: 如果你无法用你的才能无法说服别人, 就用你的废话迷惑别人吧。 \n―― W.C.菲尔兹
column3: If you can't dazzle them with brilliance, baffle them with bull. - W.C. Fields
column4: If you can't dazzle them with brilliance, baffle them with bull. - W.C. Fields
column6: If you can't dazzle them with brilliance, baffle them with bull. - W.C. Fields

column2: 聪明
column3: Smart
column4: Smart
column6: Smart

column2: 我并不特别聪明，我只是在问题上坚持的时间比较长罢了。\n―― 艾尔伯特・爱因斯坦
column3: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer. - Albert Einstein
column4: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer. - Albert Einstein
column6: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer. - Albert Einstein

column2: 机灵
column3: Bright
column4: Bright
column6: Bright

column2: 我简直太聪明了,有时连我自己都不知道自己在说什么。\n―― 奥斯卡・王尔德
column3: I'm so clever that, sometimes, I don't understand a word of what I am saying. - Oscar Wilde
column4: I'm so clever that, sometimes, I don't understand a word of what I am saying. - Oscar Wilde
column6: I'm so clever that, sometimes, I don't understand a word of what I am saying. - Oscar Wilde

column2: 愚昧

column2: 美貌易逝，愚昧永存。\n―― 朱迪・欣德林
column3: Beauty fades, dumb is forever. - Judy Sheindlin
column4: Beauty fades, dumb is forever. - Judy Sheindlin
column6: Beauty fades, dumb is forever. - Judy Sheindlin

column2: 白痴
column3: Idiot
column4: Idiot
column6: Idiot

column2: 他可能看起来像个白痴，说话像个白痴，但不要让那欺骗你。他真的是个白痴。\n―― 格劳乔・马克斯
column3: He may look like an idiot and talk like an idiot, but don't let that fool you. He really is an idiot. - Groucho Marx
column4: He may look like an idiot and talk like an idiot, but don't let that fool you. He really is an idiot. - Groucho Marx
column6: He may look like an idiot and talk like an idiot, but don't let that fool you. He really is an idiot. - Groucho Marx

column3: When the going gets tough, the tough get going. - Joe Kennedy
column4: When the going gets tough, the tough get going. - Joe Kennedy

column6: We pretend to be strong because we are weak. - Paulo Coelho

column4: All little girls should be told they are pretty, even if they aren't. - Marilyn Monroe
